title: Ep9:Wigs in Bed, Long Distance Peen and Snowballs
itunes:title: Ep9:Wigs in Bed, Long Distance Peen and Snowballs
description:
Weezy and Mandii finally answer questions from the listeners on this episode of Whoreible Decisions. Find out what "Snowballing" means and how Mandii enjoys it to another level! Also, wigs in bed? Stories are shared about the triumphs of getting through sex with a wig on. Also, how do you deal with long distance penis? Mandii gives Weezy advice on how to cope while loverboy is away. Don't forget to follow us on Instagram @whoreible_Decisions. If you want to send us in a story or advice you'd like us to share on the show email us at whoreibledecisions@gmail.com FOLLOW OUR WHORE ASSES! DUH! Mandii B IG/Twitter @Fullcourtpumps Weezy IG @WeezyWTF

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
